ac1_templateTesting.description: Automated template testing across platforms and configurations
evidence: Created QualityValidationEngine with multi-platform support
Implemented template testing across web, mobile, desktop platforms
Built framework-specific validation for NextJS, Flutter, Tauri, SvelteKit
Added comprehensive test result aggregation and reporting
Integrated quality gates with configurable thresholds

ac2_securityScanning.description: Security vulnerability scanning with automated patching
evidence: Integrated existing SecurityScanningModule into validation system
Built vulnerability detection with OWASP Top 10 compliance
Implemented security metrics tracking and reporting
Added automated security validation workflows
Created PerformanceRegressionDetector with statistical analysis
Implemented 14+ performance metrics tracking (build time, bundle size, Core Web Vitals)
Built regression detection with configurable thresholds and alerts
Added performance trend analysis and baseline comparison
Created performance benchmarking CLI integration

ac4_usageAnalytics.description: Template usage analytics and improvement identification
evidence: Created TemplateUsageAnalytics with comprehensive event tracking
Implemented pattern detection for usage spikes, errors, and abandonment
Built analytics insights engine with recommendation generation
Added predictive analytics and anomaly detection capabilities
Integrated real-time analytics streaming and reporting

ac5_qualityScoring.description: Quality scoring and compliance reporting system
evidence: Created QualityScoringCompliance with multi-dimensional scoring
Implemented quality frameworks (DNA Standard, ISO 25010, CISQ, SonarQube)
Built compliance evaluation for 10+ standards (SOC2, ISO 27001, GDPR, HIPAA, OWASP)
Added quality grade calculation (A+ through F) and certification status
Created comprehensive reporting and compliance dashboards
